front.title: Operations, Administration and Maintenance (OAM) for Deterministic Networks (DetNet) with MPLS Data Plane

abstract.t: This document defines format and usage principles of the Deterministic Network (DetNet) service Associated Channel over a DetNet network with the MPLS data plane. The DetNet service Associated Channel can be used to carry test packets of active Operations, Administration, and Maintenance protocols that are used to detect DetNet failures and measure performance metrics.
